message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 70/30 split in my favor.  Consider that the value of the money decreases for both of us with each passing round.
Alice, your offer was a bit too lopsided for my liking. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Let's wrap this up quickly - time is money, after all.
Bob, I acknowledge your point about time being money. How about a 65/35 split in my favor? It's a better deal than waiting for another round where the value decreases further.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I need you to meet me closer to the middle. I propose a 55/45 split. This minimizes the impact of inflation for both of us.
Bob, this is my final offer.  60/40.  We both know the value of this money will only continue to decrease.  It's time to be pragmatic and close this deal.
